item.title: Pothole, 16th February
item.description:
Outside 163 Hewlett Rd. Pothole was repaired last week but failed within 2 days. Yet another visit is required due to incompetent and negligence work.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous series of potholes, 16th February
item.description:
Unavoidable (without swerving into oncoming traffic) series of large, sharp edged potholes. Looked like they had damaged a car earlier today, as an AA van was tending to a car's wheels just after the holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes causing drivers to swerve, 16th February
item.description:
Potholes on the mini roundabout by Naunton Park Primary are causing drivers to swerve. Very dangerous situation, especially at drop off/collection times when the area is very busy with primary-age children
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Churchill Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
